alert.note: Alert for Kane; Washington (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 27 at 4:21PM MDT until July 27 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR WEST CENTRAL KANE AND EAST CENTRAL WASHINGTON COUNTIES...SPECIFICALLY FOR EASTERN PORTIONS OF ZION NATIONAL PARK... At 421 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms produced between .50-.75" across eastern portions of Zion National Park. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of slot canyons, creeks, and streams. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Zion National Park. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
